item.title: LLM hot takes
item.description:
To us developers, LLMs are that quintessential ‘threat and opportunity’ that we’ve all heard about. Sometimes I wonder if two commentators are sharing the same baseline experience. Some bloggers say ‘vibe coding is the goat’; others say: ‘bah, it barely works’. What’s going on?

Needless to say the …
item.dc:creator: Julz

item.title: What I’d change in the Agile Manifesto
item.description:
I just finished an Agile PM course. Quite intensive really : 20hrs over a week. Covered a lot of ground, all of it relevant and useful. And I now have a certification which is nice.

One thing that came up the other day: If you could change one thing in the …

item.description:
Architecture Decision Records

item.title: Blogging - Intro
item.description: I’ve started a few attempts to blog over the years. Having to pay for a site or maintain a server for my humble thoughts got a bit tiresome eventually. But this is a free, static site, so I’m giving it another go: Free, simple, Python, Jinja, Markdown, and …
